name: The Citizen Kane of Video Games
summary: Memories at once real and imagined! Experience Citizen Kane as never before! From the palatial Xanadu to the deathbed of Charles Foster Kane! Be amazed by a spectacle of sight and sound. Play through Every Single Shot of The Classic Movie! (for 5 minutes) At long last! The Citizen Kane of Video Games!!
